unnormalised: Remember to get your vaccinations! For example, the MMR vaccine protects against Measles, Mumps, and Rubella. Consult your Dr. for schedules or if you experience fever above 100Â°F after vaccination.
normalised: Remember to get your vaccinations! For example, the M-M-R vaccine protects against Measles, Mumps, and Rubella. Consult your Doctor for schedules or if you experience fever above one hundred degree Fahrenheit after vaccination.
